trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs> class supplies values to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event handler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs> classe fornece valores para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: You create a <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event handler to select the role provider at run time.
trans-unit.target: Você cria um <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> manipulador de eventos para selecionar o provedor de função em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event when either the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.IsCurrentUserInRole%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.GetRolesForCurrentUser%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> class is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> classe gera o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> evento quando qualquer o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.IsCurrentUserInRole%2A> método ou o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.GetRolesForCurrentUser%2A> método do <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> classe é chamada.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.User%2A> property to retrieve information about the logged-in user.
trans-unit.target: Você usa o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.User%2A> propriedade para recuperar informações sobre o usuário que fez logon.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve role information through a non-default role provider, set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.ProviderName%2A> property to the name of the role provider that you want the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> object to use.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar informações de função através de um provedor de função não padrão, defina o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.ProviderName%2A> propriedade para o nome do provedor de função que você deseja o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> objeto a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs> object to check the user name and to set the role provider to use.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos usa o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs> objeto para verificar o nome de usuário e para definir o provedor de função a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is bound to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos está associado ao <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> evento o `Application_Start` método do arquivo global. asax.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the role provider to use for retrieving the user's roles.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o provedor de função a ser usado para recuperar as funções de usuário.

trans-unit.source: The name of the role provider that is used to get the user's roles.
trans-unit.target: O nome do provedor de função que é usado para obter as funções do usuário.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.ProviderName%2A> property to set the role provider during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: Você usa o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.ProviderName%2A> propriedade para definir o provedor de função durante a <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs> object to check the user name and to set the role provider to use.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos usa o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs> objeto para verificar o nome de usuário e para definir o provedor de função a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is bound to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos está associado ao <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> evento o `Application_Start` método do arquivo global. asax.

trans-unit.source: Gets the authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o usuário autenticado.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém o usuário autenticado.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.User%2A> property to retrieve information about the user during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: Você usa o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.User%2A> propriedade para recuperar informações sobre o usuário durante o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs> object to check the user name and set the role provider to use.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos usa o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs> objeto para verificar o nome de usuário e definir o provedor de função a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is bound to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos está associado ao <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> evento o `Application_Start` método do arquivo global. asax.
